title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not displayed when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, trying to create a new table group does not display the group dialog.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try to create a new table group.
